page.title: 07Housing, Fearn.
page.content: There is a mixture of house styles in Hill of Fearn-old and modern private houses as well as new areas of coucil houses.Arabella has no council houses,only some recently erected private homes.Most houses are one or two storeys high.Many farms have cottages which used to be for farmworkers, but now they are rented out as there are fewer people on the land.The houses in Muldearg Road, Hill of Fearn have recently been renovated. Externally they have been painted a grey colour and new flagstones have been laid to replace cracked ones.The windows are now double glazed.New sink units have been installed which are brown in colour.There have been structural alterations inside also.The street looks much smarter now.
